task.title: Releasing Locks
task.shortdesc: If an object is locked by you you can release so that others can edit or annotate it.

taskbody.context: You must be the project administrator or the person who has locked the object to release the locks. At the end of some actions (e.g.: edit of a datastream), the lock is removed automatically. If an object is locked by you, a message will say so.

step.cmd: Click on the Unlockbutton in the menu bar.

taskbody.result: This takes you back to the datastream page where a banner informs the user that they have unlocked the object. If you would like to lock this object or have accidentally removed a lock, you can click on the Lock button in the menu bar.
